channel.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 62
channel.description:
[Download episode 62][1], in which Ian and Andrey talk about podcasting, marketing, blogging, free will vs determinism (whoa), adwords, Twitter and HelpSpot history, selling internet plumbing libraries, HelpSpot pricing for SaaS and on-premise, healthcare in the US, and moving to Canada.
Thanks to Linode for sponsoring this weeks show. Get $10 off your first month with code: **bootstrapped10** http://linode.com/bootstrappedfm
[1]: http://bootstrapped.fm/bootstrapped-episode-62-i-have-the-flu/

item.title: Bootstrapped.fm, episode 62
item.dc:creator: ahcox
item.description:
FTAO @ian

On Ian’s plans for ten new podcasts, this episode of the startup podcast going behind the scenes of podcast production of one episode of a new show might be of interest: http://pca.st/disz#t=2173

Get well soon Andrey!
